node.title: Jesus and Science
node.description: Humanity is inside a "Box" of rock-solid limitations. In order to understand reality and live effectively, we need Revelation from outside the "Box." But "the Box" is not empty! Reality consists of natural and supernatural. Understanding reality helps us recognize why science often doesn't agree with the Bible. How can science and math help us better understand God and His incredible creative power? Our purpose is to point to Jesus through science and Scripture!
